values:
ahh yesterday i got back from california and it was so fun! my dad was being all cool and he bought me a whole bunch of stuff! And i got to swim with dolphins! that was the coolest thing ever!!! and me n brittie went to the beach, i dont have a freakin clue why the hell or what the hell we were thinking getting all the way in the freezing cold ocean when it was 60 degrees outside! hehe well California was awesome!

last night i went to the movies with miss danni angelo! i miss hanging out with her! ahhbritts here bye

haha yay, britties coming over! and she went shopping with me yesterday and we got these cute bags that say idk cute things and we are taking them to the beach with us. if brittie meets me there. :-D and well kyle i think is coming over cause he called me 27 times this morning to wake me up and i went outside to my fone and i had 27 messages! OMG! well actually i answerd the 27th call! haha and MATT was supposed to come over today but his work schedule got messed up so he cant, but i talk to him for a loooong time last night. we talked about weeeners most of the time! haha but i talk to him on my house fone till that died, and then i talked to him on my cell fone till that died, and when i started talking to him i had a FULL battery! Damn! hehe hes a fun kid to talk to tho! well i have to go clean, and shower cause brittie n kyle are coming over. Buh BYe hehe 
xoxo 
Emma

p.s this is the last day i cant write stuff cause im leaving 4 cali for the whole spring break!!!!!!

hi, well today wasnt a good day. its really getting old how everyone thinks that im like so dumb. im out of it most of the time, but when people lie is soo obvious. I can tell when people feel a certain way and when they are lying or telling the truth. Especially when my best friends are lieing. its soo annoying. and im just getting really sick of it. ah, i always .. nvm. Well i just really had to get that out. cause its really bothering me. 

and im happy/sad cause me n matt are supposed to hang out and i dont know if we are cuase i dont know if he wants to even tho he tells me he does, it doesnt seem like it. but what ever. and now i have to go to cali, but i think me n britt are meeting up there.?! that should be fun. but i have to go there without my Matthew :-/ ahh hearbreaking!

STARBURSt Comercial was just on! i love it. 

 Well one good thing is that m dad is being really tyte about things latley, and like he just bought me 4 new pairs of shoes, and hes going to buy me a CD and he was going to let me do what i want to my hair, but i dont need to fix it i found out. and like were staying in Lahoya and its like RITE next to the beach! funn! thats my story...:-D/:-/

I have feelings 4 ****

LOve always, 
  xoxoxo
 Emma

hey guys! i love you! hehe ur the only ones that know about this one! its gay tho cause im not a cali girl but im in a beachy mood! cause it feels like summer! haha and im going to cali so yea! oh well if u wanna make fun of me then go ahead cause i dont care!!!! :-D well i just want to let u know that i love yoU!... 

Bri- skaters
alex- "thugs n Jocks" JUGS!
Emma- preps..^^hehe


Matts the coolest! hehe hes my favorite!
